00008 
00009 module global
00010 
00011   use materials, only: material_type
00012   use particle,  only: particle_type
00013   use tally,     only: tally_type
00014   use timing,    only: Timer
00015 
00016   implicit none
00017   save
00018 
00019   ! version information
00020   integer :: VERSION_MAJOR   = 0
00021   integer :: VERSION_MINOR   = 1
00022   integer :: VERSION_RELEASE = 1
00023 
00024   ! list all types
00025   type(material_type)           :: mat
00026   type(particle_type)           :: neut
00027   type(tally_type), allocatable :: tal(:)
00028 
00029   ! list history input information
00030   integer :: nhistories
00031   integer :: seed
00032   integer :: source_type
00033 
00034   ! list global vars that are set during run
00035   integer :: eidx      ! energy index for cross sections
00036   integer :: n_tallies ! number of tallies
00037 
00038   ! set max and min energy
00039   real(8) :: emin = 1e-11_8
00040   real(8) :: emax = 20.0_8
00041 
00042   ! kT value base on 300K
00043   real(8) :: kT = 8.6173324e-5_8*300*1.0e-6_8

00051 !==============================================================================
00052 ! ALLOCATE_PROBLEM
00055 
00056   subroutine allocate_problem(n)
00057 
00058     ! formal variables
00059     integer :: n ! size of tallies
00060 
00061     ! allocate tallies
00062     if (.not.allocated(tal)) allocate(tal(n))
00063 
00064   end subroutine allocate_problem
00065 
00066 !===============================================================================
00067 ! DEALLOCATE_PROBLEM
00070 
00071   subroutine deallocate_problem()
00072 
00073     use materials, only: deallocate_material
00074     use tally,     only: deallocate_tally
00075 
00076     ! local variables
00077     integer :: i  ! loop counter
00078 
00079     ! deallocate material
00080     call deallocate_material(mat)
00081 
00082     ! deallocate within tallies
00083     do i = 1,n_tallies
00084 
00085       ! deallocate tally
00086       call deallocate_tally(tal(i))
00087 
00088     end do
00089 
00090     ! deallocate tally variable
00091     if (allocated(tal)) deallocate(tal)
00092 
00093   end subroutine deallocate_problem
00094 
00095 !===============================================================================
00096 ! ADD_TO_TALLIES
00099 
00100   subroutine add_to_tallies()
00101 
00102     use tally, only: add_to_tally
00103 
00104     ! local variables
00105     integer :: i            ! loop counter
00106     real(8) :: fact = 1.0_8 ! multiplier factor
00107     real(8) :: totxs        ! total macroscopic xs of material
00108 
00109     ! compute macroscopic cross section
00110     totxs = sum(mat%totalxs(eidx,:))
00111 
00112     ! begin loop over tallies
00113     do i = 1,n_tallies
00114 
00115       ! set multiplier
00116       select case(tal(i)%react_type)
00117 
00118         ! flux only
00119         case(0)
00120           fact = 1.0_8
00121 
00122         ! absorption
00123         case(1)
00124           fact = sum(mat%absorxs(eidx,:))
00125 
00126         ! scattering
00127         case(2)
00128           fact = sum(mat%scattxs(eidx,:))
00129 
00130         ! micro capture
00131         case(3)
00132           fact = mat%isotopes(tal(i)%isotope)%xs_capt(eidx)
00133         case DEFAULT
00134           fact = 1.0_8
00135 
00136       end select
00137 
00138       ! call routine to add tally
00139       call add_to_tally(tal(i),fact,totxs,neut%E)
00140 
00141     end do
00142 
00143   end subroutine add_to_tallies
00144 
00145 !===============================================================================
00146 ! BANK_TALLIES
00149 
00150   subroutine bank_tallies()
00151 
00152     use tally, only: bank_tally
00153 
00154     ! local variables
00155     integer :: i  ! loop counter
00156 
00157     ! begin loop over tallies
00158     do i = 1,n_tallies
00159 
00160       ! call routine to bank tally
00161       call bank_tally(tal(i))
00162 
00163     end do
00164 
00165   end subroutine bank_tallies
00166 
00167 !===============================================================================
00168 ! FINALIZE_TALLIES
00171 
00172   subroutine finalize_tallies()
00173 
00174     use tally, only: calculate_statistics
00175 
00176     ! local variables
00177     integer :: i ! loop counter
00178 
00179     ! begin loop over tallies
00180     do i = 1,n_tallies
00181 
00182       ! call routine to compute statistics
00183       call calculate_statistics(tal(i),nhistories)
00184 
00185     end do
00186 
00187   end subroutine finalize_tallies
00188 
00189 end module global
